subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The last truly joyful World Series moment for the Mets was in 1986, when they rallied to win Games 6 and 7 against Boston to claim their last championship.
snippet: The last truly joyful World Series moment for the Mets was in 1986, when they rallied to win Games 6 and 7 against Boston to claim their last championship.
